src:
Marsej pobedio vicešampiona, Depaj doneo trijumf “lavovima“ u Tuluzu
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Darko
Iznenađenje kola u francuskoj Ligi 1 dogodilo se u petak kada je PSŽ izgubio od Dižona, pa su večerašnji rezultati, manje-više, očekivani.
U prvom meču dana Olimpik je na Velodromu pobedio vicešampiona Francuske, ekipu Lila, rezultatom 2:1. Svi golovi postignuti su u drugom poluvremenu, preko Sansona i autogolom Gabrijela domaći su stekli dva gola prednosti, a pogodak Soumaroa bio je dovoljan samo da se poraz Lila ublaži. Za ekipu iz Marseja od 74. minuta igrao je Nemanja Radonjić.
Najuzbudljivije je bilo u Tuluzu gde je Lion slavio 3:2 i vezao drugu uzastopnu pobedu. Domaćin je dva puta vodio, strelci su bili Sanogo i Lopez, koji je pogodio sopstevnu mrežu. Ali su Depaj i Dembele sustizali prednost Tuluza. I kada se očekivao remi, Memfis Depaj je pogodio iskosa sa leve strane u 95. minutu i svom timu doneo važan trijumf.
Strazbur, našeg Stefana Mitrovića, poražen je minimalnim rezultatom na gostovanju kod Anžea. Utakmica između Nima i rena je odložena zbog velikih padavina.
Marsej – Lil 2:1(0:0)Amijen – Brest 1:0(1:0)Mec – Monpelje 2:2(1:0)Anže – Strazbur 1:0(1:0)Tuluz – Lion 2:3(1:1)Nim – Ren – odloženo zbog kiše

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Marseille defeated vice-champion, Depaj brought triumph to "lions" in Toulouse
02 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Darko
The surprise round of the French Ligue 1 came on Friday when PSG lost to Dijon, so tonight's results are more or less expected.
In the first match of the day Olympics defeated France's vice-champion Lille at the Velodrome by a score of 2: 1. All goals were scored in the second half, through Sanson and a goal by Gabriel gave the home side two goals, and Soumaro's goal was enough only to ease Lila's defeat. Nemanja Radonjic played for the 74th minute team from Marseille.
The most exciting was in Toulouse where Lyon celebrated 3-2 and tied for the second consecutive win. The home run twice, the scorers were Sanogo and Lopez, who hit his own net. But Depaj and Dembele captured the advantage of Toulouse. And when the draw was expected, Memphis Depay struck from the left in the 95th minute and gave his team an important triumph.
Strasbourg, our Stefan Mitrovic, was defeated with a minimum score on a visit to Anze. The match between Nimo and Rennes has been postponed due to heavy rainfall.
Marseille - Lille 2: 1 (0: 0) Amiens - Brest 1: 0 (1: 0) Metz - Montpellier 2: 2 (1: 0) Angers - Strasbourg 1: 0 (1: 0) Toulouse - Lyon 2: 3 (1: 1) Nimes - Ren - delayed by rain
